sentences.en: " Holding a court debate between a new and old magistrate? "
sentences.cn: “ 你们是新旧知县官开堂会审 么 ? ”

sentences.en: He was wanted for the murder of a magistrate.
sentences.cn: 他因谋杀一名地方法官而被通缉。

sentences.en: It may be done under a warrant granted by a magistrate.
sentences.cn: 它可以根据地方法官批准的逮捕令执行.

sentences.en: John was fined 1000 dollars by the magistrate.
sentences.cn: 约翰被地方法官罚款1000美元.

sentences.en: Local people demanded that the District Magistrate apprehend the miscreants.
sentences.cn: 当地人要求地方法官逮捕那些歹徒。

sentences.en: She will face a local magistrate on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 她将在星期二面见一位地方治安法官。

sentences.en: Take me to the magistrate, and I will swear it!
sentences.cn: 把我带到地方官那里去, 我要担保作证!

sentences.en: The crown court, however, upheld the magistrate's decision.
sentences.cn: 然而，最高法院维持了地方法院的判决。

sentences.en: The magistrate fined him & 50 for driving too fast.
sentences.cn: 他因为开车太快,法官罚了他五十 英镑.

sentences.en: The magistrate fined him 10 shillings for drunkenness.
sentences.cn: 因酗酒,法官罚他十先令.

sentences.en: The magistrate granted / refused him bail.
sentences.cn: 地方法官准许[不准]他保释.

sentences.en: The magistrate interrogated the witnesses upon the details of the accident.
sentences.cn: 地方法官就事故的详细情况询问目击者.

sentences.en: The magistrate must commit him to prison.
sentences.cn: 司法官须将他交付监狱.

sentences.en: The magistrate remanded him in custody for two weeks.
sentences.cn: 法官命令把他拘留两星期.

sentences.en: The thief was brought before the magistrate.
sentences.cn: 窃贼被带到地方法官前受审.

words.tran_cn: 地方行政官的职位；地方行政长官
长官的职位；地方行政长官

trans.tran_cn: 地方法官，治安官，文职官员，治安推事
trans.tran_en: someone, not usually a lawyer, who works as a judge in a local court of law, dealing with less serious crimes
